General.Name: Grupo Mateus S.A
General.Description: Grupo Mateus S.A. operates a supermarket chain in Brazil. It also operates cash and carry, wholesale, furniture, and home appliances stores, as well as engages in e-commerce, bakery industry, and slicing and portioning centers. Grupo Mateus S.A. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in São Luís, Brazil.
General.Address: Avenida Daniel de La Touche, São Luís, MA, Brazil, 65074-115
